column1: Lovely inswinger, pitches on middle stump and swings back into the right hander, Charis tries to defend, inside edge on to pad, shout for lbw, turned down by umpire
again on same line and length, swings in, goes for the drive, gest the thick inside edge and goes to square leg
this time pitched on leg stump, hit the pad and going further down
fuller in length, on off stump, comes well forward and defended to cover
again on middle and leg stump, tries to work it away on the leg side, another inside edge onto pad
full ball, on off stump, comes well forward and defends to mid-off
short in length just outside off and moves away, goes for the cut and misses it
again good length ball, wide outside off and left alone
Gone! Back of length, just outside off and moves away, Chibhabha opens the face of the bat and steers it sraight in the hands of Iftikhar at 2nd slip for a catching practice and he takes it with ease
good length ball, on off stump, defends to cover
on leg stump, clips the pad and goes to fine leg for a legbye
short in length, just outsie off, goes for the cut and beaten by pace
lovely delivery, pitches on off stump and moves away, just misses the outside edge and off stump on the way through to keeper
again full ball, bit wide of the crease, pitches just outide off and moves away, goes for the drive and beaten again
full ball, yorker length, just outide off, angles it down to third man for a single
full ball, on off stump, pushes to mid-off
again full ball, on middle stump, Charis strides forward and defends to off side
full ball, on middle and leg stump, comes forward and tries to defend, ball hits the inner part of the bat and goes wide of mid-on fielder for couple of runs
full ball, on off stump, gets right behind it and defends to gully
short in length, on leg stump, tries to work it away, off the pad to square leg
lovely delivery, pitches on middle stump and moves away with some extra bounce and pace, misses the edge through to keeper
Hasnain strikes again! Back of length, on leg stump, Eriven tries to flick it away, gets the inner edge and Rizwan takes a good catch down the leg side
good length ball, just outside off and left alone
full ball, just outside off and moves away, well left by Taylor, covers the line of the off stump
on middle and leg stump, turned to wide of mid-on for a quick single
lovely delivery, pitches on middle stump and swings back into the right hander, faint inner edge onto pad, loud shout for lbw, turned down by umpire, replay showed that their was an edge
full ball, on off stump, defends it back to bowler
again full ball, outside off, pushed to cover
short in length, angling down the leg side through to keeper for a wide
full ball, on off stump, gets right behind the line and defends to mid-off
Full on leg stump, Taylor flicks it away off his pads and it goes over square leg fielder for four
full ball, just outside off and moves away, tries to drive and beaten
good length ball, outside off, angles it to third man
good length ball, just outside off and moves away, edges it down to third man and misfields cost four runs
full ball, on off stump, goes forward and defends to off side
short ball, Taylor tries to play a lap shot over keeper and misses it
full ball, on target, defended to cover
Shot! Full ball, on off stump, leans well forward and drives with open face of the bat, finds the gap at point for four
short ball, ducks underneath it
good length ball, just outside off and angling away, left alone
full ball, on off stump, pushes to wide of mid-off for a single
good length ball, on middle and leg stump, turned to square leg
full ball, just a solid push down the ground and runs a quick single
full ball, on middle and leg stump, pushes to wide of mid-on for a single
Gone! Superb yorker by Hasnain, it was full with some pace and it went under the bat of Chari and disturbed the stumps
good length ball, pitches on leg stump and hits the pad, going down the leg side, shout for lbw, truned down
full ball, just outside off and moves away, lets it go
good short ball, Williams ducks underneath it
full ball, on off stump, gets right behind the line and defends to mid-off
good length ball, on off stump, pushes to cover
short in length, on leg stump, turned away down to fine leg for a single
back of length, just outside off, punches to point
good length ball, on off stump, punches to cover
full ball, on off stump, comes well forward and defends to cover
good length ball, on leg stump, turned to midwicket
full ball, just outside off and moves away, lets it go
good length ball, on off stump, pushes to off side
short in length, on leg stump, went back and defended to leg side
short ball, stands tall and punches to off side
short in length, on off stump, goes back and pushes to off side
again full ball, on off stump, defended with the straight bat back to bowler
good length ball, on off stump, goes back and defends to cover
full on target, drive back to bowler and good stop by Musa in his follow through
Back of length, on off stump, goes back and pushes to cover
short ball, goes for the pull shot, top edge and it went all the way and hits the rope at fine leg
full ball, on off stump, angles it to gully for a single
good length, just outside off, punches to wide of mid-off and Wahab makes a sliding save
short in length, on leg stump, worked away to backward squaer leg for a single
full ball, on trget, gets right behind it and defends to mid-off
back of length, just ouside off, angles it down to third man for a single
good length ball, on target, punches to point
fuller in length, gets right behind the line of the ball and defends it to mid-on
short in length, whipped away to short midwicket for a single
Short in length, stands tall and punche it away to deep point fence for four
good length ball, on leg stump, tries to work it away, takes it on the pad but missing leg
again full ball, on target, defended to off side
short in length, outside off, punches to deep cover
full ball, on off stump, leans well forward and pushes in the gap between cover and extra cover for couple of runs
short ball, goes well over batsman head and called a wide
full on middle stump, Williams tries to play on the leg side, leading edge down to third man for a single
short ball, stands tall and runs it down to third man with open face of the bat
full ball, on off stump, drives to deep point for couple of runs
short in length, cuts it hard, Imam dives at point but unable to stop the ball, Taylor gets a run
full ball, on target, gets forward and defends back to bowler
short in length, outside off, punches to point
good length ball, on middle and leg stump, tucked away to leg side
short ball, outside off, goes for the cut, gets the thick outside off, Hasnain misjudged that one and misfielded as well cost four
That was better! Full ball, on middle stump, driven uppishly down the grund and no chance for the mid-on and mid-off fielder
short in length, on off stump, stands tall and defends it down
good length ball, on off stump, pushes to off side, Imam dives but fails to grab the ball
fuller in length, on off stump, gets forward and pushes to cover
good length ball, on off stump and moves away, squares him up, edges it but no slip was in place, goes to third man fence for four
short ball, outside off, moves away, tries to cut and misses it
again short ball, cuts it to deep point
slower bouncer, Williams tries to play a lap shot over keeper and misses it
good length ball, angling down the leg side through to keeper for a wide
back of length, on off stump, goes back and defends to off side
full ball, on leg stump, flicked awaay in the air and Shaheen i think the fielder who dropped it
on middle and leg stump, turned to leg side
tossed up, outside off, another reverse sweep this time on the left of short fine leg fielder for four more
on middle and leg stump, worked away to leg side for a single
tossed up, on off stump, defended on the front foot
full ball, on target, driven to mid-off
back of length, nudges it to off side for a quick single
full ball, just on off stump and moves away, Williams tries to push at it and gets beaten
back of length, on off stump, pushes to point
on middle and leg stump, turned to leg side for a single
good length ball, outside off and angling across the right hander, lets it go
from round the wicket, tossed up, outside off and spun away, treid to defend and beaten
tossed up, on leg stump, Williams went for the reverse sweep and connected well to deep point fence for four
arm ball, on off stump, came well forward and defended
tossed up, on leg stump, swept away to deep square leg
short in length, on leg stump, pulls it to short fine leg and Wahab makes a diving save
arm ball, on leg stump, went back and pushed back to bowler
full ball, on off stump, comes well forward and defends to off side
full ball, outside off, driven to deep cover for a single
good length ball, on off stump, pushes to point
full ball, yorker length, digs out back to bowler
fuller in length, on off stump, comes well forward and defends to cover
full ball, on off stump, pushes to cover for single
tossed up, outside off, punches to long-off
tossed up, on off stump, worked away to leg side for a single
tossed up, just ouside off, went for the sweep and missed it
arm ball, on middle stump, stretched forward and defended
arm ball, on off stump, tries to defend, inside edge onto pad and falls just short of Rizwan
tossed up, on off stump, pushed back to bowler
good length ball, on leg stump, turned to midwicket
tossed up, on off stump, defended to off side
tossed up, on off stump, driven to long-off
tossed up, on off stump, defended on the front foot
tossed up, on off stump, went back and defended
tossed up, on off stump, came well forward and defended
arm ball, on off stump, angles it to gully for a single
full ball, on target, tries to defend, hits the bat first, shout for lbw, turned down by umpire
short in length, on wrong line, clips the pad and goes to fine leg fence for four legbyes
Taylor brings up his 39th ODI fifty! short and wide outside off, cuts it away to wide of third man fielder for four
good length ball, on off stump, pushes to off side for a single
short in length, outside off, punches to point
good length ball, outside off, pushes to deep point
arm ball, on off stump, defended to cover
short in length, on leg stump, turned to deep midwicket
again tossed up, Taylor came down the wicket, checked his shot and worked away to leg side for a single
on middle and leg stump, worked away to wide of Imam at midwicket
tossed up, outside off, went back and across, turned to short fine leg
arm ball, on off stump, pushes to cover
Gone! good length ball, just outside off, Taylor tries to drive on the up, gets beaten by pace, bat was turned in his hand and Khushdil at extra cover took a good catch
good length ball, on middle and leg stump, turned to leg side
short ball, goes for the pull and misses it
full ball, on off stump, pushes to off side
full ball, outside off, driven to deep cover
back of length, on off stump, punches to point

again faster ball, on off stump, went back and punched to off side

short in length, outside off, driven to long-off

short in length outside off, angles it down to third man
good short ball, from round the wicket, Williams ducks underneath it
short ball, outside off, angles it down to third man for a single
another short ball, well over batsman head and Aleem Dar signals for a wide
full ball, on middle stump, almost goes through the gae, gets the inner part of the bat and goes to leg side

short in length, on leg stump, turned to fine leg

again on middle and leg stump, swept away to deep midwicket and this time makes a sliding save

on middle and leg stump, swept away to deep square leg
short in length, outside off, goes for the pull, bottom edge on the bounce to keeper

full ball, on off stump, driven to mid-off

again tossed up, on off stump, pushed to deep cover for a single

Tossed up, came down the wicket and lofted it high over mid-off, Hasnain chased it hard tried to flick the ball inside the rope and replsy shows that ball toched the rope
Back to back boundaries for Madhevere. Slightly short in length, stays back in the crease and pulls it away to deep midwicket fence for four

full ball, on off stump, drives in the air back to bowler

That was even better! Full ball, outside off, drives again and times it even better through extra cover
full ball, on off stump, pushes to cover for a quick single

Length ball, on off stump, this time Raza goes big and down the ground just the clear the long-on fence and fielder for a six
short ball, sways away and lets it go
That is his 4th ODI hundred! Full ball, outside off, tries to drive on the off side, gets the inner edge to leg side and comes back for the 2nd run
Shot! Full ball, outside off, leans well forward nad drives to extra cover fence for four
slower ball, outside off, driven to deep cover for couple of runs
full ball, driven down the ground to long-on
full ball, on middle stump, goes for the big shot, inside edge to midwicket and ran a quick single, fielder missed the stumps and no damage done
